title: @Rito Dynamic Queue For Normals When
body:
Can we get an ETA on Dynamic Queue for normal games?

I'm sick of chat deleting my calls and blocking me for 30 seconds.

replies.body: I also want this. I actually expected it to be released along with the ranked dynamic queue. Ah well... I do hope that they do release Normal Dynamic queue
It was announced that Dynamic queue will replace Blind Pick on the OCE server.
Don't mean to necro or anything, but do you have a source on this?  I'd love for this to be a thing.

They don't like doing too much of this sort of thing at once because it can make queues unstable. It will probably happen eventually, though they may tweak it somewhat to fit norms a bit better. People should now also be used to locking in picks/bans so people won't be getting 20 min normal queues as well.

~~They plan to release solo Q first though,~~ so we may be waiting a while for dyna normals.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0dp3EZw0,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-02-09T11:14:53.330+0000)
>
> They plan to release solo Q first though, so we may be waiting a while for dyna normals.

Pitty this never happened.

Yes please, Blind pick is so dumb, you get mirror match ups or verse the same champs every game.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
